channel.description: Recent content in Bof on leo_something

item.title: Srdnlen 2025 - Snowstorm
item.description: Interesting pwn challenge regarding the exploitation of a simple stack BOF.

item.title: OpenECSC Round 3 - Log4x86
item.description: This challenge comes from the 3rd round of openECSC 2024. The challenge was really really interesting: the exploitation tecnique involved a buffer overflow through a really short format string vulnerability.
